snippet: Militias from rival towns in western Libya battled each other with tanks and artillery on Tuesday in fierce fighting that killed at least 22 people, local officials said.
abstract: Militias from rival towns in western Libya battle each other with tanks and artillery in fierce fighting that kills at least 22 people;
lead_paragraph: Militias from rival towns in western Libya battled each other with tanks and artillery on Tuesday in fierce fighting that killed at least 22 people, local officials said.

headline.seo: Clash of Libyan Militias Kills at Least 22
headline.main: Battle Between Rival Libyan Militias Kills at Least 22
